isis.stitle: GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - REMOVE AND INSTALL - MECHANICAL GAUGES (AIR)

svcsubproc.title: Removing Mechanical Gauges
svcsubproc.para: The cluster must be removed (refer to Removing Instrument Cluster) and the face plate removed. To remove the face plate:

step1.para: Remove all of the mechanical gauge bezels.

step2.para: Remove the bezels by turning 1/8 turn counterclockwise and lift the bezel completely away from the face plate. Repeat this procedure for all of the mechanical gauges in the cluster.
Remove all of the electrical gauges (refer to Removing Electric Gauges) from the cluster.

step1.para: Remove the face plate from the housing.
To remove the mechanical gauge, remove the three screws attaching the gauge bracket to the housing and remove the gauge/bracket assembly.
To remove the bracket from the gauge, remove the retainer nut.

svcsubproc.title: Installing Mechanical Gauges
svcsubproc.para: To install, reverse the process listed above.
